product_name: Advanced Elements Inflatable Kayak Foot Brace
long_description: The Advanced Elements Inflatable Foot brace offers a compact design and a friction fit that provides additional foot brace support in your inflatable kayak. Fits the following Advanced Elements kayaks, sold separately: AdvancedFrame, AdvancedFrame Sport, AdvancedFrame Convertible (front only), Lagoon 1, Lagoon 2 (front only).
short_description: The Advanced Elements Inflatable Foot brace offers a compact design and a friction fit that provides additional foot brace support in your inflatable kayak.
